name: inform6
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: Clear introduction and installation but severely lacking in quick-start examples, configuration guidance, and troubleshooting content.
readme.top_issue: No quick-start code example showing how to compile a basic Inform game after installation - directs users to external books instead of providing immediate hands-on guidance

common_complaints: Build system lacks standard packaging variables (BINDIR, DESTDIR)
sentiment.summary: The inform6 project shows signs of maintenance stagnation with numerous unresolved issues from 2015-2016 related to licensing clarity, packaging compatibility, and documentation quality, with minimal maintainer engagement.

concerns: No commits in over 5+ years (last commit July 2018)
5 open issues with no resolution activity
No closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
maintenance.summary: The inform6 package appears completely abandoned with no development activity since 2018 and unaddressed open issues.

analysis_summary.unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.
